snippet: A Mivos Quartet program paired madrigals by Carlo Gesualdo with new works by Kate Soper and Clara Iannotta.
abstract: David Allen reviews performance of Mivos Quartet with composer-soprano Kate Soper at Columbia University's Italian Academy.
lead_paragraph: A Mivos Quartet program paired madrigals by Carlo Gesualdo with new works by Kate Soper and Clara Iannotta.

headline.main: Review: Mivos Quartet Performs Gesualdo, Berg and Kate Soper
headline.print_headline: Exalted, Ferocious Love and Rides on Atonality’s Edge
